title: Designing Downton Abbey, an Interview with Anna Mary Scott Robbins
itunes:title: Designing Downton Abbey, an Interview with Anna Mary Scott Robbins
description:
This week, we speak with Anna Mary Scott Robbins, the costume designer behind one of the most beloved television series, and now films, Downton Abbey.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
